changeSet.sql: create table transaction_history ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id BIGINT, customer_id BIGINT, sim_id BIGINT, branch_id BIGINT, transaction_type_id BIGINT, customer_phone_number VARCHAR(15), transaction_amount DOUBLE, discount DOUBLE, CREATION_DATE TIMESTAMP, LAST_MODIFICATION_DATE TIMESTAMP, one_egp INT DEFAULT 0, five_egp INT DEFAULT 0, ten_egp INT DEFAULT 0, twenty_egp INT DEFAULT 0, fifty_egp INT DEFAULT 0, one_hundred_egp INT DEFAULT 0, two_hundred_egp INT DEFAULT 0, notes VARCHAR(500), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id), FOREIGN KEY(customer_id) REFERENCES customer(id), FOREIGN KEY(sim_id) REFERENCES sim_details(id), FOREIGN KEY(branch_id) REFERENCES branch(id), FOREIGN KEY(transaction_type_id) REFERENCES transaction_type_lookup(id) )
